document.full_text: algeria is on the path to political reforms and last month's lifting of a state of emergency is the first step, president abdelaziz bouteflika was quoted as saying by state media on saturday.
document.title: algeria's president promises political reform
lines_and_colors: algeria is on the path to political reforms and last month's lifting of a state of emergency is the first step, president abdelaziz bouteflika was quoted as saying by state media on saturday.
